title: MLS Cup final: Inter Miami v Vancouver Whitecaps – live
summary: Inter Miami faces the Vancouver Whitecaps in the MLS Cup final. The match is being covered live by Beau Dure, providing minute-by-minute updates. Fans can follow all the key moments of the exciting showdown.

title: Strictly Come Dancing: week 11 – as it happened
summary: Musicals Week featured a new Dance Relay and concluded with Paddington's ballroom debut. Amber Davies topped the leaderboard, while Karen Carney landed in last place. The competition intensifies as contestants prepare for the penultimate dance-off.

title: Leeds 3-3 Liverpool: Premier League – as it happened
summary: Leeds United fought back twice to earn a draw against Liverpool, exploiting the home team's defensive vulnerabilities. The match was closely monitored by Scott Murray, highlighting the ongoing issues plaguing Liverpool's backline. The game showcased Leeds' resilience and Liverpool's struggle to maintain leads.

title: Africa Cup of Nations shunted into margins as greedy game finds no room at top table | Jonathan Wilson
summary: The Premier League's investment in its players creates a disparity with FIFA's minimal support, hindering the development and integration of Africa's flagship tournament. This imbalance reflects ongoing challenges faced by African football on a global stage. As a result, the tournament continues to struggle for recognition and support.

title: Tanaka equaliser caps thrilling comeback as Leeds deny Liverpool
summary: Leeds secured a dramatic 3-3 draw against Liverpool, with Ao Tanaka netting a stoppage-time equaliser. The match saw Leeds twice come from behind to level the score. The thrilling encounter showcased the resilience of both teams.
